title: SIZE AND COLOUR OF PROTECTIVE  EARTHING CONDUCTORS

content.text: This clause of IS 17017(Part 2/Sec 1) is applicable  except as follows:
2) For single phase system supply phase to phase this contact  can be used for L2 (mains 2).
3) Position number does not refer to the location and/or  identification of the contact in the accessory.

The core connected to the earthing terminal shall be  identified by the colour combination green-and-yellow.  The nominal cross/sectional area of the earthing  conductor and of the neutral conductor, if any, shall be  at least equal to that of the phase conductors .
